name: Color Fire
description:
Color Fire is a puzzle FPS ,with a bit of die and retry, were you are using the Color Gun, a riffle able to making reacting things of the same color of your shot.

==================================================

Use ZQSD to move, SHIFT to run, E to interact, left click to shoot and scrolling wheel to change the color of the gun. To reload, keep R pressed and shake your mouse.

When you shoot something, if it's of the same color than the shot, it react. 

If something isn't in the right color, try to repaint it with a paint barrel.

Your goal is to solve puzzles and fight ennemies in a castle. Find the boss and beat it.

/!\ Be careful at the start of the game, if you try to shoot while looking to far, like looking the sky, the shot will messed up /!\

==================================================

Game made in three weeks by Richard VERET (SHADOW 6004 https://shadow-6004.itch.io),  Julien Fetas (Julio Le Zermouk), Nathan Manolios and Tom Hautenberger.

==================================================

There are cheat codes : you can use num pad (1-7) to teleport into the differents rooms of the game.
